body.p: Wondering how Gentoo Linux stacks up against other distributions? In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter you'll read about a comparison test of the load-time performances of Gentoo Linux for Pentium III with and without prelink and a default installation of Mandrake 9.1. There's also a profile of developer Thomas Raschbacher, a tip about using qpkg, and plenty of community coverage. Enjoy!
